Summary Tommaso del Re heads International BD for LinkedIn out of Singapore. In this role Tommaso is responsible identifying, negotiating and closing partnerships that help accelerate LinkedIn's growth in the market.  
 
Prior to LinkedIn Tommaso oversaw the the BD team for Yahoo! across India and SEA leading a team of 15 with presence in all the region's key markets. In this role Tommaso grew Yahoo's mobile reach at a faster rate than market growth through development and management of distribution partnerships, developed a multimillion dollar business from scratch through commercial partnerships and struck an innovative, Yahoo!-first global, partnership with Mediatek (MTK) that will see Yahoo! mobile reach aggressively grow globally by working with MTK, ODMs, Solution Providers and ODMs/local brands. 
 
Prior to the role with Yahoo! in Singapore, Tommaso headed the Mobile and Business Dev initiatives for Yahoo!7 in Australia. Under this tenure Tommaso managed the multimillion dollar platform distribution partnership with Telecom NZ, extended the scope to include mobile, closed and managed the mobile advertising reseller partnership with Hutchinson 3 and led all telco distribution and mobile GTM initiatives. 
 
Prior to joining Yahoo! Tommaso worked for LEF interactive, the outsourced management company handling the Kazaa operations. The role included driving content licensing and promotion initiatives as well as managing the key advertising reseller partnerships. During this tenure Tommaso closed many high profile content partnerships despite the challenging context surrounding P2P distribution. 
 
Before moving to Australia Tommaso served as Strat Alliance Manager for Bertelsmann AG in London where he managed the multimillion marketing partnership between Bertelsmann and AOL Time Warner across Europe and US.  
 
Tommaso was born in London, grew up in Italy, is fluent in English and Italian. Tommaso holds a bachelor in Business and Economics from the Universita' Cattolica of Milan.
